name: TRooTech Business Solutions
description:
TRooTech Business Solutions is registered as a software development company, incorporated in India. With its registered office in Ahmedabad (Gujarat, India), TRooTech Business Solutions also has an international development facility. TRooTech’s office is equipped with latest infrastructure that comprises of latest software and hardware required to create cutting-edge solutions for our esteemed clients.
The workstations have capacity to house 120+ experienced and highly qualified engineers, developers, designers, server/system administrators and internet marketing personnel.
Our core expertise relates to the fields of software development, custom web design, web application development, mobile application development and Omni channel solutions – be it for any industry domain or the case of excelling Startups and Enterprises, TRooTech aces them all.
READ MORE...
